Text:
Thanks for sharing..... but why would you upload an album that's already been uploaded here 9 times?

Just curious....
I'm uploading an entire cd collection, don't care if a single album is already here or not...

Thanks for this! Awesome album and in response to why someone would upload something again. Old torrents may lack seeders and speed so uploading it again gives people the chance to get it quicker. 

And of course this version is in Flac and anyone who knows a little about music knows this is a lossless format and leaps over MP3 even at 320 Kbps and sounds first class played in a car.

Many thanks trfkad your uploads are appreciated!

thanks trfkad!
this flac format codec is awesome man, the quality is excellent, if you accustom to hear music in this format you're going to forget mp3
